mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (name, isbn, author, publisher, publish_date, category_id, price, total, available, cover, location, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{isbn}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publishDate}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{total}, #{available}, #{cover}, #{location}, #{description})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM book WHERE id IN #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET available = available + #{num} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.name as category_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
